author: Simon Difford
description: Great rye whiskey notes with hints of orange and cherry. Slightly sweet but all too easy.
name: Rock 'n' Rye
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
